title: Senior Media Planner, Strategy
content:
As a Senior Media Planner, you will play a crucial role in translating media briefs into practical and tangible media strategies & executions. You will provide support for the Associate Directors of Media strategy, and collaborate with Media Investment leads to create holistic media plans & actively clear roadblocks, while mitigating risks to ensure successful media execution. 
With a strategic and holistic mindset, you will consider the entire audience experience and ensure adequate media mix &  investment across all channels. Proactively collaborating across teams, you will ensure a comprehensive media strategy that meets the needs of the client brief. You will closely monitor marketplace dynamics and evaluate current offerings and capabilities across industry trends. 
Maintaining overall accountability for team quality assurance (QA) based on published expectations and plan parameters will be essential. Additionally, you will serve as a regional representative to key media partners and participate in global negotiation activities. Supporting the workflow & ensuring timely delivery effectively across various teams, such as BI, media activation, analytics, partner representatives, client teams, account leads, and creative partners, you will foster a collaborative mindset and maintain a high attention to detail. 
Tracking campaign performance and recommending optimizations as necessary will be crucial, along with active participation in client reporting and insight sessions to ensure the effective translation of media activities to business objectives and vice versa. 
Key Responsibilities: 

Translate media briefs into practical and tangible media strategies, ensuring alignment with client objectives. 
Collaborate with the Media Investment & Activation teams, ensuring comprehensive media plans with realistic execution potential
Think strategically and holistically about the entire audience experience, ensuring appropriate media  mix &  investment across all channels. 
Proactively deliver strategic insight related to client briefs and industry trends
Translate audience data & market context into actionable media strategies
Stay informed about marketplace dynamics and evaluate current offerings and capabilities across industry trends. 
Maintain overall accountability for complete & timely plan development in line with client briefs
Serve as a regional representative to media partners 
Fostering collaboration effectively across various teams and maximizing resources. 
Maintain a high attention to detail in all aspects of strategic planning and project management
Ensure effective & efficient campaign execution in line with strategic campaign planning
Participate actively in client reporting and insight sessions to ensure the effective translation of media activities to business objectives and vice versa. 

Qualifications: 

3-4 years of relevant media experience 
Experience with media planning tools is a plus, but not required (TGI, GWI, Commspoint, Kantar etc.)
Demonstrated ability to translate media briefs into actionable and practical media plans. 
Strong collaboration skills and the ability to ensure project timelines  
Proven experience in translating data & insights into holistic media campaigns relative to client briefs
Strategic and holistic thinking, considering the entire audience experience and optimizing media mix & investments across channels. 
Proactive mindset, constantly anticipating questions & potential requests based on evolving client needs. 
Strong understanding of marketplace dynamics and the ability to evaluate offerings and capabilities across industry trends. 
Collaborative mindset and high attention to detail in all aspects of strategic planning and execution. 
Active participation in client reporting and insight sessions, ensuring the translation of media 

 If you are a seasoned media planner with a strategic mindset, strong collaboration abilities, and a passion for driving successful media plans, we invite you to join our team as a Senior Media Planner. Together, we will deliver impactful campaigns, optimize audience experiences, and achieve outstanding business results in the dynamic media landscape.About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
